featured.text: Some documents noted that Russians “indulge in excessive drinking whenever the occasion arises,” while others claimed that Russians “rarely drink wine.”

definition.zh_def: 沉溺於某種享受或放縱自己，通常是指過度滿足自己的欲望或需求。
definition.en_def: To allow oneself to enjoy something, often to excess; to give in to one's desires.
definition.example: She decided to indulge in a piece of chocolate cake after dinner.
